transaction.longDescription: Transacción que se utiliza para iniciar procesos. Por lo regular se utiliza cuando el inicio de los procesos o de algún proceso se hace leyendo de archivos planos ubicados en el sistema operativo donde está alojada la instancia ABAP.

transaction.longDescription: Transacción que se utiliza para reanudar procesos que están en ejecución, bien sea en estado error o en estado satisfactorio pero no de finalización del proceso.

program.description: Para INICIAR LOA PROCESO DEL ORQUESTADOR
program.longDescription: Solo es necesaria en los casos en los cuales la información de entrada a los procesos no es disparada por un proceso interno de SAP (ejemplo: contabilización de una factura SD) o por la publicación de un servicio web o el llamado de un servicio de PI hacia el ERP. Es decir, este proceso solo se debería configurar cuando la información de entrada llega a través de archivos a una carpeta del sistema operativo donde está la instancia ABAP.
program.name: /EDGE/FC_START_PROCESSES

program.description: Programa para ejecutar el proceso de orquestador periodicamente
program.longDescription: Este JOB es completamente necesario configurarlo, ya que tiene como responsabilidad reanudar los procesos de facturación electrónica para cualquier intérprete. Parámetros generales para el JOB: Programa: /EDGE/FC_RESUME_EINVOICES Usuario con el que debe ejecutarse: WF-BATCH Periodicidad: entre cada 3 a 5 minutos según como se evalúe con el cliente y la criticidad de sus procesos. Al finalizar la ejecución del JOB, éste deja un reporte de su ejecución, el cual puede verse en el SPOOL del sistema.
program.name: /EDGE/FC_RESUME_EINVOICES

transaction.longDescription: Using the ST03 transaction profile, you can identify transactions that cause a significant part of total response time, as well as transactions with high database request times -- another indicator for expensive SQL statements. The latter function is also available using the statistical record analysis: Restrict the display to the dialog steps taking more than, for example, 1500 ms of database request time. This threshold depends on the requirements

transaction.description: All Work Processes of an Instance
transaction.name: SM50

transaction.description: Request queues of the application server
transaction.longDescription:
the administrative data for the dispatcher
You can find information about the kernel (release, release notes, and so on) in transaction SM51. Choose Release Information.
Transaction SM51: All Instances of an SAP System, shows all currently active instances of an SAP system together with an instance dentification and the processes and services offered by the instance. The instance identification has the form <server name>_<system ID>_<instance number>. Inactive instances (that is, defined but switched off) are not visible in this transaction.
transaction.name: SM51

transaction.longDescription: se ve mas antigua que la ST04
transaction.name: ST04OLD

transaction.longDescription: Provides information about the size of the database and its components as tablespaces. In addition, it is possible to get detailed data of tables, indexes, and views. Inconsistencies between the ABAP dictionary and the database, missing indexes, or fragmentations can also be analyzed with the monitor.
transaction.name: DB02

transaction.description: All active work processes of a SAP system
transaction.longDescription: All Active Work Processes of an SAP System, is the global workprocess overview and shows all currently running work processes, independently of the instance for which they are configured. Work processes that are not busy at the time of the snapshot are not visible by default.
transaction.name: SM66

transaction.description: Utilidades servicios web MUY IMPORTANTE PARA MONITOREAR WS!!
transaction.name: SRT_UTIL

transaction.longDescription: Generar datos para el ejemplo que reemplaza lo que antes hacía SFLIGHT y demás. NetWeaver Enterprise Procurement Model. EPM is a test application that serves as a proxy for SAP’s real-world Business Suite applications. It is based on real-world business logic and scenarios that can be used for differing testing approaches and is equipped with the means to generate meaningful test data. To summarize, EPM can support various testing or demo purposes: Simulation of standard business processes inside the NetWeaver layer. This allows verifying, demonstrating and testing the usage of the technology at an early stage. Automated regression testing of existing development Demo application for rollouts or trainings Performance measurement of NW technologies EPM is a pure demo application residing in the NetWeaver layer with no dependencies. EPM runs out-of-the box without additional configuration efforts.
transaction.name: SEPM_DG

transaction.longDescription: Para el ejemplo viejo de las aerolineas y las reservas el modelling object es BC_TRAVEL

transaction.longDescription: To combine static and dynamic performance analysis results. The SQL performance worrklist SWLT allows you to correlate SQL runtime data with ABAP code analysis to plan optimizations. For performance optimization, combine the results of both static source code analysis (carried out via the ATP or Code Inspector) and the SQL Monitor runtime data.
transaction.name: SWLT
